attributes.additional_details: The British Government must strongly denounce osrael's Operation Pillar of Cloud which threatens to turn into another cast-Lead. Millions of innocent Palestineans will be at risk and thousands will die if it is allowed to continue. The British government should expel the Israeli ambassador if Israel continues with this aggression against a defenceless civilian population. All arms, dual-purpose materials (that can be used for weapons) and aid should be stopped from going to Israel untill this aggression is suspended.
